nodes.text: Bergan was a Human male who was a Rebel Elite Commando of the Rebel Alliance Special Forces during the Galactic Civil War. He accompanied Leia, Chewbacca, Han Solo, and Luke Skywalker to Kiva on a mission to stop Project Starscream. Bergan trained with Rebel soldiers and quickly climbed the ranks. On a mission to Kiva, he was in charge of baby-sitting Zak Arranda, Tash Arranda, and the baby, Eppon. He died when Eppon attacked him.
